Leituras Sugeridas

Esta é uma lista de livros a ser editada colaborativamente. Espero a contribuição de todos com comentários para que possamos priorizar e adicionar/remover recomendações.

versão 1.0:
Lean

  • Lean Software Development: An Agile Toolkit

Livro essencial, especialmente para entender a filosofia Lean aplicada ao desenvolvimento de software.

  • The Lean Startup: How Today’s Entrepreneurs Use Continuous Innovation to Create Radically Successful Businesses

Outro livro essencial, não se engane pelo título: Startup é qualquer empreendimento humano em um ambiente de grande incerteza. É claramente aplicável a iniciativas de mudanças organizacionais.

  • Kanban: Successful Evolutionary Change for Your Technology Business

Este é o livro sobre o método Kanban.

  • The Principles of Product Development Flow: Second Generation Lean Product Development
  • Lean from the Trenches: Managing Large-Scale Projects with Kanban
  • Implementing Lean Software Development: From Concept to Cash
  • Leading Lean Software Development: Results Are not the Point
  • Toyota Production System: Beyond Large-Scale Production
  • Learning to See: Value Stream Mapping to Add Value and Eliminate MUDA
  • The Machine That Changed the World: The Story of Lean Production– Toyota’s Secret Weapon in the Global Car Wars That Is Now Revolutionizing​ World Industry
  • Personal Kanban: Mapping Work | Navigating Life
  • The Lean Six Sigma Pocket Toolbook : A Quick Reference Guide to 70 Tools for Improving Quality and Speed
  • Running Lean: Iterate from Plan A to a Plan That Works (Lean (O’Reilly))
  • Toyota Kata : Managing People for Improvement, Adaptiveness and Superior Results
  • Scrumban: Essays on Kanban Systems for Lean Software Development
  • The Toyota Way: 14 Management Principles from the World’s Greatest Manufacturer

Agile

  • Management 3.0: Leading Agile Developers, Developing Agile Leaders
  • Agile Retrospectives:​ Making Good Teams Great
  • Agile Coaching
  • Practices of an Agile Developer: Working in the Real World (Pragmatic Bookshelf)
  • Agile Project Management: Creating Innovative Products (2nd Edition)
  • Agile Software Requirements: Lean Requirements Practices for Teams, Programs, and the Enterprise (Agile Software Development Series)
  • Agile Product Management with Scrum: Creating Products that Customers Love (Addison-Wesley​ Signature Series (Cohn))
  • User Stories Applied: For Agile Software Development
  • Succeeding with Agile: Software Development Using Scrum
  • Agile Estimating and Planning
  • Coaching Agile Teams: A Companion for ScrumMasters, Agile Coaches, and Project Managers in Transition (Addison-Wesley​ Signature Series (Cohn))
  • Extreme Programming Explained: Embrace Change, 2nd Edition (The XP Series)
  • Agile Testing: A Practical Guide for Testers and Agile Teams

Pessoas

  • Peopleware: Productive Projects and Teams
  • Great Boss Dead Boss
  • Brain Rules: 12 Principles for Surviving and Thriving at Work, Home, and School
  • Drive: The Surprising Truth About What Motivates Us

Systems Thinking

  • Thinking in Systems: A Primer

Negociação

  • Beyond Reason: Using Emotions as You Negotiate
  • The Third Side: Why We Fight and How We Can Stop

Change

  • Driving Technical Change

Outros:

  • The Mythical Man-Month: Essays on Software Engineering, Anniversary Edition (2nd Edition)
  • The Goal: A Process of Ongoing Improvement
  • The Leader’s Guide to Radical Management: Reinventing the Workplace for the 21st Century
  • Dr. Deming: The American Who Taught the Japanese About Quality
  • Out of the Crisis
  • Quality Productivity and Competitive Position
  • The New Economics for Industry, Government, Education
  • Slack: Getting Past Burnout, Busywork, and the Myth of Total Efficiency
  • Critical Chain: A Business Novel
  • Theory of Constraints Handbook
  • On Organizational Learning
  • The Ropes to Skip and the Ropes to Know: Studies in Organizational Theory and Behavior (Wiley)
  • Collaboration Explained: Facilitation Skills for Software Project Leaders
  • The Innovator’s Dilemma: When New Technologies Cause Great Firms to Fail
  • Total Engagement: Using Games and Virtual Worlds to Change the Way People Work and Businesses Compete
  • The Failure of Risk Management: Why It’s Broken and How to Fix It
  • The Flaw of Averages: Why We Underestimate Risk in the Face of Uncertainty
  • The Black Swan: Second Edition: The Impact of the Highly Improbable Fragility”
  • How to Measure Anything: Finding the Value of Intangibles in Business
  • How Google Tests Software
  • The Fifth Discipline: The Art & Practice of The Learning Organization
  • Adaptive Software Development: A Collaborative Approach to Managing Complex Systems
  • Innovation Games: Creating Breakthrough Products Through Collaborative Play
  • How Buildings Learn: What Happens After They’re Built
  • Teamwork Is an Individual Skill: Getting Your Work Done When Sharing Responsibility
  • Managing the Design Factory
  • Behind Closed Doors: Secrets of Great Management (Pragmatic Programmers)

Livros Grátis:

  • Priming Kanban
  • Kanban and Scrum – making the most of both
  • Scrum and XP from the Trenches (Enterprise Software Development)
